Question
========
  
Evaluate the following two statements about multiple linear regression analysis:

I. Scatterplots (scatterplots) can be used to assess whether the assumption of linear relationships among the variables is violated. II. When the assumption of homoscedasticity is violated, some scores on an independent variable deviate significantly from the overall trend (outliers).

  
Answerlist
----------
* I is correct, II is correct.
* I is correct, II is incorrect.
* I is not correct, II is correct.
* I is not correct, II is not correct.
